name: ODE Consulting® Pte. Ltd.
description: ODE Consulting is Organization Development (OD) Excellence. Founded in 1996, we are driven by a desire to effect real change and accelerate business results through our Learning, Coaching and Consulting Practices. With offices in Singapore, China, and India, and a Global Partner Network, ODE Consulting ® has helped clients accelerate business results by delivering end-to-end integrated holistic solutions. Our trademark methodologies and approaches have delivered significant business impact and transformed individuals and organizations. ODE is also an Approved Training Organization (ATO) accredited by the Singapore Government.

enhanced_description: ODE Consulting® Pte. Ltd., established in 1996, specializes in Organization Development (OD) excellence. They are dedicated to driving real change and accelerating business results through their core practices: Learning, Coaching, and Consulting. With a global presence supported by offices in Singapore, China, and India, and an extensive Global Partner Network, ODE Consulting delivers end-to-end integrated holistic solutions. Their offerings leverage trademark methodologies and approaches, focusing on accelerating skill development and learning efficiency. The learning solutions include self-directed, bite-size eLearning modules, realistic business simulations for skill application, and interactive, facilitated virtual classes, all supported by an integrated LMS for progress tracking. ODE is also an Approved Training Organization (ATO) accredited by the Singapore Government.
